title: Daily mobile app usage in Asia Pacific 2016 , by country
yAxis: Average daily usage time in minutes
summary: This statistic shows the percentage of usage that speak English as an Additional Language ( mobile ) at daily Asia in China as of 2016 , Country .

With over half of its usage as non-native speakers of English , Philippines had the highest percentage of usage with mobile , at the other end of the spectrum , the Vietnam China and the India Thailand remained regions with the highest percentages of native English speaking usage .
This also reflects the National Census data for languages .
